Наша философия проста:
«Our philosophy is simple - offer what you love at a price
for which you would buy yourself and do more than is expected of you.

The main principle is to be as open as possible with clients
because we value their trust, which as a result leads
to long-term relationships.»
«We believe that life is given for happiness. We make the moments
of happiness of our customers brighter and more valuable by
presenting exclusive jewellery and handmade clothes.»
Под именем Constella собраны самые утонч:
The very finest and established collections from around the world
are brought together under the name of Constella.We represent not only exquisite European brands,
such as Utopia, Crivelli, Casato Roma, Magerit, but also new, progressive brands,
such as Tirisi, Bee Goddess, Axenoff Jewelery, Liza Belotserkovskaya.
У нас представлены не только известные е:
We present not only well-known European brands 
 from Italy and Spain, but also carefully selected collections of famous jewellery brands from India, Russia and Turkey.
Главные ценности Constella:
The main values of Constella are to be aware of all the world trends 
 in jewellery and to consistently provide first-class service, building warm and conciliatory relations with clients.
Благодаря инициативе Жанны Кан: Thanks to the initiative of Zhanna Kahn, since 2005 the worldwide brand Damiani has gained a foothold on the jewellery scene of Kazakhstan.
Выбор бренда был неслучаен: The choice of the brand was not accidental, because Damiani is at the top of the Italian jewellery market and enjoys success around the world as the highest expression of style and tradition.
За 95 лет существования:
For 95 years of its existence, the Damiani house has grown from a family workshop 
 into a global jewellery brand. The company has received many awards 
 for its products, including 18 highest from the "Diamonds International Award".
В 2018 году ювелирный дом: In 2018, the jewellery house was inspired by the culture and traditions of Kazakhstan and created the Alsara jewellery line in collaboration with Aliya Nazarbayeva. The collection was enthusiastically welcomed and presented not only in our branded stores but also in fashion houses in Rome, Milan, London, Dubai and Moscow.
В марте 2017 года в Казахстане: In March 2017, a unique clothing brand "Zardozi" appeared in Kazakhstan. The Zardozi line includes both clothing items as jackets, dresses, vests, bathrobes, and accessories - belts, handbags and phone cases. The Zardozi carte de visite is a unique Indian embroidery with gold thread, which is completely handmade.
Этот метод зародился в XVII веке: This method originated in the XVII century and served as the main decoration of the dresses of kings, court residents and luxurious interiors.
Бренд, появившийся всего несколько лет н: The brand, which appeared just a few years ago, has already managed to become a real breakthrough in the fashion world. Zardozi collections have conquered fashion houses all over the world – Paris, London, Milan, Dubai, Saint Tropez and Monaco highly appreciated the maitre's neat piece of work.
За все 15 лет, которые компания существу:
For all the 15 years that the company has been on the market, we have not stopped participating in various charity projects, because we consider 
 it an important part of our social activities.
Мы не раз сотрудничали с благотворительн:
We have repeatedly collaborated with the charitable foundations as "Asylbala",
"Dara", "Charity", "Saby", "Mother's House" (“Ана Yйi” ), "Bobek". Thanks to the support of our clients, we have managed to solve really important problems: from the establishment of playgrounds to the construction of an emergency surgery centre.
Бренд DAMIANI в поиске Менеджера:
The company representing the DAMIANI brand is in search of a customer relationship manager.
We will be glad to see a talented person in our team.Each parcel is assigned an individual tracking number, as well as insurance in the amount of 0.75% of the price of the goods
Осуществляет подбор кадров: The Customer Relationship Manager's responsibilities include recruitment and holding interviews with applicants.
Создание HR политики и процессов с нуля:
Creation of HR policies and processes from scratch. Formation
and development of a positive HR-image of the company.

график работы 5/2 плавающий: Work schedule of 5/2, flextime, 8 hours of work + 1 hour of lunch
скидки сотрудников на продукцию до 50%: Discounts on products for up to 50% for employees

We do everything to ensure that every order from our store is processed
and delivered as soon as possible right to your door

For our customers from Nur-Sultan, Almaty and Shymkent, delivery

We deliver our goods using the SDEC postal service throughout the CIS (Azerbaijan, Armenia, Belarus, Georgia, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Moldova, Russia, Tajikistan,

You can check the goods and equipment,

Задержки в доставке возможны ввиду: Delays in delivery are possible due to unforeseen circumstances of the courier service and are not related to the operation of the online store.

Как оформить заказ на сайте?: How to place an order on the website?
Вы можете пройти регистрацию в самом нач:
You can register at the very beginning or continue shopping without registration and enter
contact details already when placing a ready order.
Как рассчитывается стоимость доставки?: How is the delivery (shipping) cost calculated?
Для наших клиентов из Нур-Султана, Алмат: For our clients from Nur-Sultan, Almaty and Shymkent, delivery is free of charge.
Заказы могут быть оплачены онлайн банков: 1. Orders can be paid online with Visa, MasterCard, AmericanExpress, Maestro and JCB bank cards when placing an order on the website
Также вы можете оплатить заказ наличными:
2.  You can also pay for the order in cash or by card at any of our branded stores. By your
arrival, we will pack any products chosen and prepare the necessary documents.
Как узнать в каком из фирменных бутиков: How do I find out which of the branded boutiques has the jewellery I need?
Назовите консультанту артикул выбранного: Tell the consultant the article of the selected product, the city and the salon of interest, as well as the size or length, if necessary.
Можно ли добавить еще одну позицию: Is it possible to add another item or change the size to an already placed order?
Внесение изменений в подтвержденный зака: The confirmed order may be changed if it has not yet been sent to the courier service. Contact us by phone ... or leave a request for a callback.
Можно ли вернуть товар?: Is it possible to return the product?
Вы можете вернуть товар, который вам не: You can return the products that did not suit you to one of our branded boutiques or use the courier service in Kazakhstan. According to the Laws of the Republic of Kazakhstan, the return may be issued within 14 calendar days from the date of purchase.
Чтобы узнать подробнее об условиях возвр: To learn more about the conditions for return, follow this link.
В какие сроки можно оформить возврат?: In what time frame the return may be issued?
В соответствии с законодательством РК: According to the laws of the Republic of Kazakhstan, you can issue a return of the purchase within 14 calendar days after the receipt.
Когда вернут деньги за товар?: When will the money for the goods be refunded?
Деньги за заказ вернутся на вашу карту:
The money for the order will be returned to your card within 14 working days from the 
 moment of receipt of the goods in one of our stores.
Обращаем ваше внимание, что возврат: Обращаем ваше внимание, что возврат денежных средств зависит от скорости обработки операции вашим Банком.
Есть ли у вас особые условия для постоян: Do you have special conditions for frequent shoppers?
Да, в нашей компании разработана:
Yes, our company has developed a Loyalty System that provides cash back or an instant
discount on purchases made. If you want to start participating in the loyalty program, leave a
request to contact the consultant and we will contact you as soon as possible.
Чтобы узнать подробнее об условиях Прогр: To learn more about the terms of the loyalty program, follow this link.

Настоящая Политика конфиденциальности (д: This Privacy Policy (hereinafter referred to as the Policy) was developed by STELLA KAZAKHSTAN LLP (hereinafter referred to as the Company) to familiarize Users of the Company's websites or its Agents with the methods of collecting information, processing it, including use and distribution, and establishes the Company's obligations for non-disclosure and ensuring the privacy protection regime for personal data that the website Users and Agents provide, when registering on the website of the Online Shop, or when placing an order for purchase of the Goods. This Policy applies to information obtained through the Company's websites, mobile websites, applications and other interactive means used, which contain a link to this Policy. Website Users and Agents are not employees of the Company. Therefore, the Company does not control and is not responsible for receipt, use and disclosure of Personal Information by Website Users or Agents, including, for the purposes of promoting and selling products. Usage of the Online Shop website or other websites of the Company by the User means acceptance of this Privacy Policy and the terms of processing of the User's personal data. In case of disagreement with the terms of the Privacy Policy, the website User or Agent must stop using the Company's Online Shop website and its other websites.
Получение Личной информации. «Личная инф: Obtaining Personal Information. Personal information is the information that can identify you, such as your name, mailing address (including billing address and delivery address), telephone number, email address, credit card number, etc.
для ответов на запросы: to respond to inquiries, process product orders;
для направления информацию касательно: to send information regarding cooperation and joint transactions;
для отправки необходимой информации: to send necessary information, by regular mail and e-mail, by phone and SMS messages;
пользоваться Сайтом/Платформой Компании: to use the Company's Website/Platform and communicate with other users through the Website;
для внутренних целей, включая анализ: for internal purposes, including data analysis, auditing, developing new products, improving the website, expanding services, identifying sales trends and determining effectiveness of advertising campaigns;
для выполнения заказов, осуществления пл: to fulfill orders, make payments and provide appropriate customer service.
Администрация сайта Интернет-магазина: The website administration of the Online Shop is employees authorized to manage the website, acting on behalf of the Company, who organize and/or carry out processing of personal data, and also determine purposes of processing the personal data,  composition of the personal data to be processed, actions/operations performed, in respect of the personal data.
Персональные данные - любая информация: Personal data are any information relating directly or indirectly to a specific or identifiable individual (subject of personal data).
Обработка персональных данных - любое де: Processing of personal data is any action/operation or a set of actions/operations performed with or without use of automation tools with personal data, including collection, recording, systematization, accumulation, storage, clarification (updating, changing), extraction, use, transfer (distribution, provision, access), depersonalization, blocking, deletion, destruction of the personal data. Confidentiality of personal data is a mandatory requirement for the Operator or other person, who has access to personal data, to comply with the requirement not to allow distribution of the personal data, without consent of the subject of the personal data or other legal grounds. The user of the Online Shop website is a person, who has access to the Website via the Internet, and uses the Website of the Online Shop.
Раскрытие Личной информации допустимо:: Disclosure of Personal Information is permissible for:
аффиливанным компаниям, третьим лицам: taffiliated companies, the third parties that provide the Company with services, such as website hosting, data analysis, cash management, order delivery, infrastructure provision, IT services, customer service, email services, credit card transactions, audit, training, etc. (Such third parties will be provided with or access to your Personal Information for the purposes of providing the services described above to the Company or on behalf of the Company);
если это необходимо или уместно: if necessary or appropriate: (a) in accordance with applicable law, including laws outside your country of residence; (b) to enforce a court order; (c) to comply with government orders, including those outside your country of residence; (d) to comply with the rules of cooperation established by us; (e) to protect our activities or those of our affiliates; (f) to protect the rights, confidential information, security, property of the Company, as well as affiliates, Agents, Users of the Company's websites or other persons; and (g) to exercise the Company's right to use available resources of protection of the law, or to be able to mitigate potential losses.
Obtaining Non-Personal Information. Non-Personal Information refers to any information that does not identify a person, in particular:
информация, полученная с помощью cookies: information obtained through cookies, pixel tags and other technologies;
демографические данные и другие сведения: demographic data and other information provided by Agents and Users of the Company's websites;
Так, например, Компания может узнать:: For example, the Company may find out:
тип вашего компьютера: your computer type (Windows or Macintosh), screen resolution, operating system version, Internet browser version;
демографическую информацию: demographic information, which includes location, education, profession, age, gender, as well as other information, such as hobbies and professional interests, if Agents and Users of the Company's websites voluntarily provide them to the Company. Unless combined with the Personal Information, such information does not identify you or others.
Совокупные данные. Компания может объеди: Aggregate data. The Company may combine Personal Data, if the combined information cannot identify an individual, for example, when the Personal Information is used to calculate the percentage of Agents and Users of the Company's websites in a particular region. In some cases, it is acceptable to combine Personal and Non-Personal Information (such as name and geographic location information). Information that combines Personal and Non-Personal Information will be subject to the rules for use of the Personal Information. Use and Disclosure of Non-Personal Information. Since Non-Personal Information cannot identify a person, the Company may receive, use and disclose it for any purpose.
Cookies: Пользователи сайтов Компании: Cookies: Users of the Company's websites and Agents may use cookies on the Website. Cookies allow a web server to transfer data to a computer for storage and other purposes. The Company uses cookies and other technologies, in particular, in order to provide a higher level of service, provide more complete information, and ensure the ability to constantly use the Website. Service providers are also allowed to use cookies on the Company's website. If you, as an Agent or User of the Company's websites, do not need information obtained through cookies, you can refuse the use of cookies. This is a standard function that is available in almost all browsers.
Объекты локальной памяти: Компания может: On-device memory objects: The Company may use on-device sharing Flash objects (Flash Objects) for certain purposes, in particular, in order to identify Agents or Users of the Company's websites. Pixel tags and other technologies: Transparent GIF files are small images with a unique name, much like cookies by function. However, unlike cookies, which are stored on your computer's hard drive, transparent GIF files are hidden tools and are built into website pages. The Company may use transparent GIF files (also known as web beacons and pixel tags) on the Website to, among other things, track visitor activities on the Website and compile statistics about Website usage and responding speed. The Company and the third party service providers may also use transparent GIF files in HTML email messages to monitor the responding speed, determine success of marketing campaigns, and know when emails are being checked and sent. Website analytics: The Company may work with the third party service providers that use technologies described in this section to perform website analytics, track and understand how visitors use the Website. Widgets, applications and other tools. If you choose to use technologies we provide (such as widgets), then any Personal or Non-Personal Information obtained through such technologies may become public, for example, through social networks, other Websites and platforms on which you can activate the corresponding tool. In addition, some technologies may be virally transferred on other platforms (for example, your friend or client may post a widget on its blog, containing your information). The Company is not responsible for receipt, use or distribution of Personal Information and/or other information that becomes publicly-accessible.
IP-АДРЕСА:
IP ADDRESSES
The way to determine your computer's IP address is a number that is automatically set to your computer by the Internet Service Provider (ISP). The IP address may be automatically determined and registered in the server log, when the user visits the Website; in addition, time of visit and pages visited are recorded. Determining the IP address is a standard practice that is done automatically, on many websites.
Правила использования и разглашения IP-а:
Rules for the use and disclosure of IP addresses
of the Company may use the IP addresses to determine the Website usage statistics, diagnose server problems, detect fraud, operate the Website, and for other purposes. The Company may use the IP addresses and disclose them to the third parties for any purpose, for which the Personal Information is used and shared. Please, note that the Company considers the IP addresses, the server log and related data to be the Non-Personal Information in all cases, except as specifically provided in applicable law.
Cоциальные сети и интерактивные средства: SOCIAL NETWORKS AND INTERACTIVE SOCIAL MEDIA
Специальные функции нашего Сайта позволя: Special functions of our Website allow you to interact with us and other users. Communication is carried out through weblogs, forums, private messages, chats and specific communities. When you use these social media, please, be aware that the information you provide, including your name, location, and email address, may be available to other users. We are not responsible for the information posted via two-way communication tools, and we strongly recommend that you do not provide the sensitive Personal Information (e.g., your health or credit card information). If you use these communication media, your Personal Information may remain on the Website, even after you leave it.
Наш Сайт может содержать ссылки на сайты: Our Website may contain links to the websites of the third parties providers and organizations. We are not responsible for observance of confidentiality on the third party websites that are linked to or linked to our Website, as well as for the observance of confidentiality by the online advertising third parties. If the Website contains a link to any other website, this does not mean that its content is approved by the Company. Agents are solely responsible for their websites and the information provided on them.
Компания может привлекать сторонние рекл: The Company may engage the third party advertising agencies to work with advertising posted on the Website. These agencies may use information about your visits to the Website to advertise products and services that may be of interest to you. In the course of advertising on the Website, such organizations may place or recognize unique cookies of your browser.
Компания принимает все разумные организа: The Company takes all reasonable organizational, technical and administrative measures to protect the Personal Information under its control. But it is impossible to guarantee complete security, when sending data over the Internet and storing it in the system. If you have a reason to suppose that your interaction with us has become unsecured (e.g., you suspect that security of your account on our system is at risk), please, report it immediately.
Компания может хранить Личную информацию: The Company may retain the Personal Information for the period necessary to fulfill the purposes set forth in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required by law.
Использование сайта детьми: USE OF THE WEBSITE BY CHILDREN
Настоящий Сайт не предназначен для испол: This Website is not intended for use by persons under the age of 14 (fourteen), and we ask such persons not to submit their Personal Information through the Website.
Передача информации за пределы страны: TRANSFER OF INFORMATION OUT OF COUNTRY
Ваша Личная информация может храниться и: Your Personal Information may be stored and processed in any country, where the Company operates. By interacting with the Company and providing us with your Personal Information, you agree that it may be transferred to another country, where the information protection rules may differ from those adopted in the Republic of Kazakhstan.
Компания оставляет за собой право на пер: The Company reserves the right to make periodic changes to this Privacy Policy. Changes to the Privacy Policy come into effect when a new version of the Policy is published on the Website. By interacting with the Company after such changes are made, you accept the new version of the Privacy Policy.
